uml2rca.conversion

Class AssociationToRContextConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.conversion.AbstractConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,rca.RContext>
        • uml2rca.conversion.AssociationToRContextConversion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,rca.RContext>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,rca.RContext>

    public class AssociationToRContextConversion
extends AbstractConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,rca.RContext>
    an AssociationToRContextsConversion concrete class that is used to convert a R-UML-conforming unidirectional binary association, having no owned attributes, between concrete R-UML conforming classes, into an equivalent RCA relational context.

    The conversion consists of creating an equivalent target relational context having a name chosen by an expert or the same name as the source association in case no name was provided.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractConversion, Association, RContext

      • nameRContext

        private void nameRContext(rca.RContext context)
        Sets the name of an RCA target relational context.

        If no name is provided by the expert, the source association's name will be used to name the target relational context.
        Parameters:
        context - the RCA relational context to name
